import axios from 'axios' import { i_camera, i_contact, i_document, i_emoticon, i_image, i_location, i_plus, i_profileMenu } from "../../../../../images"; import React,{useState} from 'react' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useSelector, useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { ChatList,NewMessage } from '../../../../../Redux/Actions/chatlist'; import { GetMessage, SendMessage } from '../../../../../Redux/Actions/message' const {REACT_APP_API_URL, REACT_APP_API_IMAGE_URL} = process.env const Message = (props) =>{ const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ message: '-' }) const [loginLoading, setLoading] = useState(false) const dispatch = useDispatch() const [text, setText] = useState(null) const [updated, setUpdated] = useState(null) const { data:user } = useSelector((state)=> state.UserLogin) React.useEffect(()=>{ dispatch(GetMessage(user.data.token,props.chatroom)) },[props,updated]) const { data:chat } = useSelector((state) => state.GetMessage) const handler = (event) => { if(event.charCode == 13){ dispatch(SendMessage(user.data.token,chat.chatroom,user.data.id_user,text,setLoginLoading)) setUpdated(!updated) setText('') } }; return(
{/* {user.map((element)=>(
{element.name}
Online
))} */}
dada
Online
{chat && chat.map((element)=>( (element.user1 == user.data.id_user)?

{element.message}

))}
handler(e)} onChange={(e) => setText(e.target.value)}/>

) } export default Message
